Title: The Bollnas Project
swagger_description:
# The Bollnas Project 

## The Bollnas Project

The Bollnas project is a set of sensor hubs that are used to monitor the main boiler and other sensors around the house.  The project is designed to be modular and easy to use, with a focus on simplicity and ease of use.
